KKA81NG6lNUC3JYz.name: Elemental Thieves' Tools
KKA81NG6lNUC3JYz.description: You can use your chosen element like a set of thieves’ tools, allowing you to make thieves’ tools checks without actually having them to hand by such as by making skeleton keys out of stone or ice, melting lock components with fire or cutting tripwires with focused blasts of shearing air. Doing this leaves obvious signs of magical tinkering behind, whether your check succeeds or fails.

qHJCfA94DetA4wuA.name: Elemental Denaturing (10ft cube)
qHJCfA94DetA4wuA.description:
As an action you can spend 1 point of exertion to “denature” a 10-foot cube of an element you have affinity with and can see within 60 feet of you.

  • Earthen or stone ground crumbles into quicksand and loses its fertility; plants cannot be grown in the soil and it becomes difficult terrain.
  • Fire continues to burn, but no longer gives off any heat, consuming its fuel at the same ambient temperature as the surrounding environment.
  • Water becomes non-potable and normally-buoyant objects sink to the bottom of it.
  • Air becomes still and loses its oxygen content. A creature in the cube must hold its breath or begin suffocating. This also extinguishes any open flames.

    These changes have no fixed duration, but mixing the denatured element with unaffected elements of its type dissipates the denatured element harmlessly. For example, a 5-foot section of a larger fire will slowly return to heat as the surrounding fire warms it (though if the entire fire is contained in the cube, it will not), barren sand can be harmlessly mixed into fertile soil, and air and water currents will harmlessly dissipate denatured elements of their type. Left unattended, a denatured area is absorbed by the surrounding environment and vanishes after 1d4 hours unless sealed in a container or otherwise prevented from co-mingling with the normal element of its type.

system.description:
In your studies, you have learned to disable the expected traits of your chosen element to aid your friends and confound your foes. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you would gain a Skill Trick or an Elemental Adaptation, you can choose freely from either list.
